subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: With the N.F.L. scouting combine launching the run-up to the draft and the start of free agency, the next few weeks will be as important to success in 2009 as any nail-biting victory in November.
snippet: With the N.F.L. scouting combine launching the run-up to the draft and the start of free agency, the next few weeks will be as important to success in 2009 as any nail-biting victory in November.
